name: KRYPTO
description:
Krypto kurrency is under attack! Old money senses a threat and has taken the Koins hostage! Explore the house, liberate the outposts by defeating all the enemies, collect the glowing Koins and toss them into the burning safe to increase your krypto earning power!

-Sneak around the house taking enemies out using kombos, finger guns and flick attacks
-Gain advantage by climbing surfaces and pouncing on enemies
-Throw dead coins to cause distractions
-Collect kills and upgrade your mining rig
